column3: some sort of sharp edge between before and after. But there is no such thing. You can take a u-turn where youâ€™re walking on the pavement but people are just on their own ways home

column1: theglasschild 39572185897 "2013-01-03 16:32:54 GMT" http://theglasschild.tumblr.com/post/39572185897/my-personal-philosophy-1-turning-knowledge-into " Thereâ€™s a lot of things I want to learn and do this year
column2: and one of them is a new blog-serie called â€œMy Personal Philosophyâ€ which will be a longer blog-post every Monday about whatever is going on in my world and head. Itâ€™s not Monday
column3: but itâ€™s the first day of a new year with new possibilities
column4: so here is the first post: â€œTurning knowledge into actionâ€. I hope you like it :)  Click here to read the whole post I know Iâ€™m only 21 years old and that Iâ€™m still a kid
column6: trying to find my way. I donâ€™t have an education or a degree and I never had a real job. I havenâ€™t had a lot of close relationships or friendships and I never learned how to interact with my family. I never had a teacher whoâ€¦ Â Iâ€™ve been open and interested in peopleâ€™s beliefs
column9: philosophies and reasons to live. Iâ€™ve listened and asked and gathered different theories about what all this is about
column10: without being judgmental. Iâ€™ve collected thoughts and reasons just so that I can form my own philosophy from all this. Iâ€™m learning Buddhism
column12: Zen and meditation so that I can take the bits that I want to keep and place it in my own world
column13: and from all thisÂ create my own reality.Â My own story
column14: my own religion - so that I can live my life on my own terms.Â And thatâ€™s the conclusion Iâ€™m trying to make. Lately Iâ€™ve been feeling the need to get an education
column15: but from all the thinking Iâ€™ve done the conclusion is that the only reason to why I want to teach myself
column17: is so that I can live my life to my fullest potential
column18: according to me.Â To be able to live my life exactly in the way I want to live it. So that nothing holds me back
column20: only possibilities. So that I can write my own story in my own words.But to be able to write with your fullest potential you need skills
column21: practice and knowledge. Thatâ€™s the difference between being a good writer and a bad one. A good singer and a bad one -the ability to transform your vision and knowledge into action.Â  Itâ€™s not about learning
column23: Â so that you canÂ transform knowledge into action.Â Because you can educate yourself and learn everything there is to know
column24: but if you donâ€™t use it
column25: if you donâ€™tÂ transform your knowledge into action
column26: Â if you donâ€™tÂ live your own personal philosophy
column27: Â youâ€™ve missed the point.Â  Iâ€™m only 21
column30: and then turning it into action
column31: so that I can live my life according to my own belief. And thatâ€™s what itâ€™s all about.Â My reality is up to me to create
column32: no one else. If you take your life in your own hands
column33: no one can take it away from you. Letâ€™s live our lives to our fullest potential this year
column34: and letâ€™s remember that life is happening right here
column35: right now. This is it. Everything youâ€™ve done up until now has lead you to this very moment. And youâ€™re exactly where youâ€™re supposed to be. You have earned the present. Click here to read the whole post   " True link

column1: theglasschild 37824316563 "2012-12-13 10:16:34 GMT" http://theglasschild.tumblr.com/post/37824316563/i-always-wanted-to-be-someones-somebody "I always wanted to be someoneâ€™s somebody. Itâ€™s such a romantic idea - to know that youâ€™re everything to one person. That their world moves because you exist. Doesnâ€™t that amaze you? That your mere existence can bring such joy to a person? It leaves me in awe to know that I could mean so much. The world is hard and cruel
column2: and itâ€™s been a long journey trying to find my place. And one day
column3: I thought I found where I belonged - right next to you. Because you made me smile and made my heart feel freer than itâ€™d ever felt before. I would dare to bet that no oneâ€™s ever felt as much joy as youâ€™ve given me. But
column4: you also brought the sadness. Sorrow so deep and aching that I laid in bed for days not moving because the pain was too much to bear. And you promised to never hurt me
column5: and I know youâ€™d never intentionally inflict such wickedness upon me
column6: but it happened all the same. I guess it just proves that youâ€™re human. Someone once told me that I deserve the most love in the entire world. And I think thatâ€™s true for everybody. Each person deserves the most. The most happiness. The most love. The most reasons to live. And youâ€™ve given me so much of this. But
column7: I still donâ€™t know if Iâ€™m truly yours. Iâ€™m just waiting for the day when Iâ€™ll know for sure.When Iâ€™ll know for sure that Iâ€™m someoneâ€™s somebody.Â " True link

column1: theglasschild 34818972105 "2012-11-02 07:48:04 GMT" http://theglasschild.tumblr.com/post/34818972105/the-grand-pep-talk-decide-to-rise-refer-to-this "Iâ€™m all for mental health days. And gentleness. And I think the world should take the month of December off. And for the love of God
column2: a 4 day work week would revolutionize the collective human spirit and thusly
column3: healthcare. But this pep talk isnâ€™t about taking it easy
column4: Â this is about another form of self care: doing whatever it takes. Just got dumped? Lace up your runners and move your body.Under the weather? Go in to work any way
column5: wearing your favorite sweater.Up to your earrings in deadlines? Go cheer on your friend. Show up at the bake sale. Call your mother.Crying before show time? Put some tea bags on your eyes. Say a prayer. Enter stage left.Push. Turn up the volume. Go hard.Â Go harder.Re-prioritize your aches and pains.Infuse your sensitivities with courage.Tell fear toÂ fuck right the fuck off.Devote to Done. There are soul-justified reasons to cancel. There are times to just stop. This isnâ€™t one of them. Keep going. Show up. Full on. Full tilt. Full out.Â Decide to be one of those people who pull it off. Do what you say youâ€™re going to do.Â Donâ€™t let us down.Â Decide to rise. Why decide to rise? Not for the reasons you might think. In fact
column6: these are the reasons that will make you sick and tired: Do not rise out of obligation. Do not rise because of feared consequences. Do not rise because you think being tough makes you smarter (it doesnâ€™t.) Decide to rise because you want to expand â€” your being
column8: yourÂ possibilities. Decide to rise because super powers are meant to be activated and applied in everyday life. Decide to rise to explore your place in the universe. On the other side of deciding to rise is illumination
column10: insight. And the angel of your strength is there waiting
column13: with a goblet of endorphins for you. Drink up. When you transcend circumstances you get special privileges. You get evidence that you are indeed amazing
column14: and irrefutable proof that what your heart and mind choose is what matters. And you get the deep knowingÂ that life wants you to win. Decide to rise. Lean in. Listen up. Closely.Itâ€™s your soul speaking and she says
column15: Â Get UP! I need you. I want you. I am you. Choose me.Lean in. Listen up. Closely. Decide to rise. Danielle LaPorte" True link

column1: theglasschild 33839398592 "2012-10-18 16:03:00 GMT" http://theglasschild.tumblr.com/post/33839398592/i-am-not-a-gun-you-are-not-lovely-the-bones-you " you are not â€˜lovelyâ€™Â the bones you are made of are not beautifulyou are not vulnerableÂ or fragileÂ or a â€˜winter girlâ€™you are not porcelainÂ your loneliness is not romanticÂ you are not clean andÂ whiteÂ or coldÂ and untouchedÂ you are not the creaking of floorboardsÂ or the bitter wind on pale skinÂ you are not delicateÂ Â you are not made of ivory and blue veinsÂ you are not â€˜lovelyâ€™ you are a messy bedroom and crumpled bed sheetsÂ you are a tear stained faceÂ Â black make up on raw red skinÂ Â angryÂ you are a foghornÂ loud and ghastlyÂ you are an empty houseÂ Â the fireâ€™s gone outÂ you are a broken recordÂ the same song scratching over and overÂ no one wants to listenÂ you are harsh jagged anglesÂ broken finger nails on a chalk boardÂ you are the smell of sweat and rotting foodÂ you are grazed knuckles and a swollen throatÂ you are 5pm still in bedÂ Â curtains shut door lockedÂ Â â€œlet me dieâ€Â mother cryingÂ you are not light headedÂ you are heavy as leadÂ you are sadÂ patheticÂ get upÂ live you are not â€˜lovelyâ€™   This is so beautiful and relevant. Sometimes I wish someone could push me to the wall and scream this in my ear." True link
